zh-CN.description: MAB logical reasoning section primarily assesses the candidate's ability to understand, analyze, judge, and synthesize various pieces of information, as well as their logical thinking skills in reasoning, argumentation, comparison, and evaluation.

zh-CN.description: Mathematics is a human tool for describing, understanding and revealing the laws of nature in an abstract and logical way, and a language for expressing those laws.
